post:
![MikroVPS logo](https://static.mikrovps.hu/images/logo.png)

We are pleased to announce that SSD OpenVZ VPS services in USA, Buffalo (Colocrossing) is now available from MikroVPS!

We would like to give a same quality services like in Hungary, in the USA.

> **Free managed cPanel VPS**
> We are providing a limited, but free support for cPanel installing, managing or upgrading.
> [More information in this link.](https://my.mikrovps.hu/knowledgebase/44/cPanelorWHM-tamogatas.html)

----------
Hardware details:

 - Intel E3-1240 v3 CPU
 - Supermicro X10SLM-F
 - 4x Samsung 840 EVO SSD in **RAID10**
 - 32 GB RAM
 - 1 Gbit/s connection

----------
**USVZ-SSD-256M**

 - vCPU: 1 core
 - RAM: 256 MB
 - vSWAP: 256 MB
 - HDD: 5 GB
 - Bandwidth: 256 GB
 - 1+1 IPv4[^ip]

5,90 € | 1800 HUF / Semi-Annually - [Order here](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&pid=347&language=English)

----------

**USVZ-SSD-512M**

 - vCPU: 2 core
 - RAM: 512 MB
 - vSWAP: 512 MB
 - HDD: 10 GB
 - Bandwidth: 512 GB
 - 1+1 IPv4 [^ip2]

4,92 € | 1500 HUF / Quarterly - [Order here](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&pid=348&language=English)

----------

**USVZ-SSD-1G**

 - vCPU: 3 core
 - RAM: 1024 MB
 - vSWAP: 1024 MB
 - HDD: 25 GB
 - Bandwidth: 1 TB 
 - 1+1 IPv4 [^ip3]

9,84 € | 3 000 HUF / Quarterly - [Order here](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&pid=349&language=English)

----------

You can find more information in our website: [www.mikrovps.eu/vps/ssd-openvz](http://www.mikrovps.eu/vps/ssd-openvz#us)

> **Note**: All prices exclusive of VAT! If you are living in EU, and you don't have EU VAT, you need to pay 27% VAT.

[^ip]: Please open a support ticket if you want to use the second IP address, and we will add it to your services. We reserve the right to remove the free IP address if you don't use it.

[^ip2]: Please open a support ticket if you want to use the second IP address, and we will add it to your services. We reserve the right to remove the free IP address if you don't use it.

[^ip3]: Please open a support ticket if you want to use the second IP address, and we will add it to your services. We reserve the right to remove the free IP address if you don't use it.
